subject: Greetings
body:
Greetings and thanks for your message.



I am satisfied with the glory of God that you will take proper care of the funds to the less privileged.



I have contacted you to use this money for the work of God, since I am not capable of handling the money because of my health condition.

God knows us, and he has a reason and a great purpose of directing this message to you.



My medical Doctor told me that I would not last for the next six months due to my cancer problem, having known my condition I made this decision because I don't want the bank to transfer the funds to the government coffer as an unclaimed funds if I die, that is why I decided to contact you.



Please send me your full name and address, I will submit your name and information to my attorney in order to prepare authorization in your name, I will send you the copy of the authorization, and also send a copy to the bank that will prove that you are my representative and the manager of the fund deposited in the bank.

And then, I will instruct the bank to transfer the funds to your own bank account in order to fulfill my last wish.



I will undergo surgery soon, so I will want us to conclude this transaction before my surgery, as we may not say the outcome of the surgery.



You shall take 30% of the total amount transferred to your account as my representative and manager of the funds, and then use 70% for the work of God.

I send you my pictures and ID in order to know me more.



I am waiting for your mail.

Stay in good health and remain blessed.



Engr. Joly SH





Hello Engr. Joly SH,

Thank you for reaching out to me and sharing your story. I'm sorry to hear about your health condition, and I hope you're receiving the best possible care.

I appreciate your intention to donate a significant sum of money for a good cause. It's wonderful that you want to help orphanage homes and those affected by cancer. Can you please provide more details about the fund? How much exactly are you planning to donate, and how would you like me to handle it?

Also, I would like to know more about your late husband and his wishes regarding this donation. Understanding the background will help me better understand the purpose behind this generous act.

Thank you again for considering me for this opportunity. I look forward to hearing from you soon.
Best wishes,

Martha

subject: Re: Greetings
body:
Hello Martha,

Thank you for your response and kind words. I appreciate your willingness to help with this noble cause. The total amount of the fund is $5 million, which my late husband and I had set aside for charitable purposes.

As for how you can handle the donation, I would suggest that once the funds are transferred to your account, you can work with reputable organizations or charities that specialize in supporting orphanage homes and cancer patients. They will be able to ensure that the money is used effectively and reaches those who need it most.

Regarding my late husband, he was a successful businessman who believed strongly in giving back to society. He always wanted to make a positive impact on the lives of others, especially those facing difficult circumstances like cancer patients and orphaned children.

I hope this provides you with more clarity about our intentions. Please let me know if you have any further questions or concerns. Thank you again for your willingness to assist in this endeavor.

Warm regards,
Engr.

Best wishes,
Martha
